name: SMOD
description:
SMOD is a sandbox game where you can build contraptions, play different gamemodes or just screw around until the game breaks. Play around with vehicles, machines, npc's or just push your friends into a horde of different creatures.  The game comes boxed with a handful of modes which you can combine with eachother to play the game however you want. 

- Firearms

- Melee

- AI

- Building

- Combinable Gamemodes

- Co-op up to 6 players

- Machines

- Physics

- Vehicles

Do what you want, play how you want.
